message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $800000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the market value is worth no more than $1500000 to me.
